thread.title: Texas to withdraw from feds' refugee program over terror threat
thread.title_full: Texas to withdraw from feds' refugee program over terror threat | Fox News

author: Joe F
text:
Good for Texas! The single most important priority of government is first and foremost always to keep us safe!!

Now, instead of focusing on a " refugee resettlement program", when is my drinking water going to be safe? You mean to tell me in 2016, in the USA, my drinking water is suspect? Shame on government! Shame on us for allowing this to happen. Shame on us for not demanding the reasonable will of the people be enforced. 
"Government works", my favorite oxymoron.
